This is one of the best games I have ever seen. With amazing graphics with an epic storyline and lovable characters what is not to love?! The puzzles in this game are so challenging which gives you a sense of acheivement when they are completed. My I now say that the humour in this game is yet to meet it's match. 11/10 from me!

Impresionante juego con una mecánica única y fascinante. Recomendadísimo a todo el mundo, sin excepciones. Tanto si te gustan los plataformas como los puzzles como los videojuegos en general, Portal 2 es obligado.

Now you're thinking with portals.

This game is all about logical thinking. There are so many options and only one way out in the chambers. Totally awesome and hilarious storyline and has one of the best storyline endings. I'd highly recommend this game to anyone. This is one of the games that any gamer MUST play at least once. Some may find it boring when stuck in some areas. But believe me there is always a way to get out and it gets more and more awesome as we proceed through the storyline.

A game like only Valve can make. I thought Portal was good until I played Portal 2. The multiplayer and challenges will keep you entertained for a long time after you beat the single player campaign.

Игра стоит того чтобы ее пройти не один раз.

The game is great.  I was happy that the single player campaine was longer than the portal 1.  It was just as funny as the first.  The game presented new chanllenges that kept the game play fresh from the first.  And if that wasn't enough.  The co-op mode is awesome.  It adds a whole extra layer to the complexity of the puzzles.  The communication features in the co-op mode are nice.  There is also a feature that allows you to create your own puzzles to share.  I would personally recommend playing portal 1 first for the story, but if you had to choose just one or the other, I would definately choose this one.

This game really makes you think about every single move you have to make. There is a lot of content and the co-op version is much more fun.
This game may have been out for a few years now but its loads of fun with some extremely easy and tough puzzles to solve, and the voiceovers are truly amusing from the AI's...
A perfect game

This game is one of the first i got here on steam, and boy am i GLaD i did it. 
Hours of fun in the main story, which can feel a bit over extended at times, but still an amazing follow up after Portal. 

The online part: 
In the coop feature (that allows you to have fun killing your gaming companion if that's your wish) you can enjoy new puzzles that can only be solved with teamwork! And if story telling has taught us anything, is that the power of teamwork knows no bounds, and to challenge that we have the custom levels made by fans who get a kick out of having other players die to their intricate layouts.

A great gaming experience that i recommend to everyone who wants a good puzzle game.

Muito Foda Este Jogo

Portal 2 takes everything that was great about the first game and kicks it into high gear! At no point playing the game did I want to pry myself away; a truly engrossing and thought-provoking game if ever there was one.

Otro de los grandes aportes que nos da Valve. Horas y horas de diversión y entretenimiento en resolución de puzles y rompecabezas. La campaña es algo sublime, que mezcla la acción y tensión de la trama con entretenimiento, diversión y diálogo por parte de los personajes. El modo cooperativo, que te dará cientos de horas de diversión sin límites, ya que gracias al  Workshop tendrás nuevos desafíos constantemente para ti y tu compañero, unos que te harán sufrir alomejor, pero la interacción con tu compañero es sin duda lo que te hará reir sin parar.
Para disfrutar de este juego en su totalidad recomiendo tener un amigo con el que te puedas entender (idioma), ya que sino las cámaras cooperativas podrían ser un suplicio.
La calidad-precio que nos ofrece Valve con este tipo de juegos cada día tiene mi más sincero reconocimiento. Gracias Valve.
Brilliant game, it carrys on well from the first on and i love the story

This game have no defects
10/10
good game, makes one think head and include logic

This. Game. Is. Fantastic. 
10/10. 
Funny, great atmosphere, great dialogue, crisp, smooth graphics, memorable characters, and lots and lots of puzzles.
None of the puzzles were too hard or frustrating, although some of them did take some time and experimentation to figure out. It's all part of the experience though. 
The robots in this game have more personality than the lead characters in many other AAA titles I have played. Seriously. 
If you havent already, please buy Portal and then after you're done with that pick this up too. It retains all the original charm and adds some too.
And remember, if life gives you lemons, set fire to someone's house with them.
This is a very fun game and you can build your own stages.
Very addictive,, Genius & Innovative puzzle game!!

เกมนี้ต้องใช้ สมอง มากเบย

The particle physics, lighting and shading are all phenomenal and a huge improvement on the original. The scale of the levels is fairly large and very open leaving you free to roam around and take in the little details. Some added mechanics like the gels are fun and create more interesting puzzles. The humor is sometimes dark but mostly goofy.

That being said, there is a particular feature of the game that is just plain broken. It's a HUD that is supposed to be opened in multiplayer but you can still access it in single player and if you do there is no way to get out of it. You have to exit the game and reload. Frustrating, because the key that triggers it is right next to the wasd keys. Eventually I had to unmap the key in the settings in order to avoid it happening again. Some levels are also just plain poorly designed. Had an invisible wall blocking me from portal jumping onto a platform. In terms of narrative, I think they took a step back. Part of what made Portal so interesting was how much was left unexplained and the weirdly Ikea-esque feeling it had. With this game, I felt like I was just wandering around in a ware house most of the time. The sound track was also grating. Was ready to turn off the music close to the end.

It's safe to say, I have my fair share of gripes with this game. The physics are something though and I feel it's a cool game to play if you're demoing your gaming rig to some one. Admittedly I did chuckle some times too. I haven't completed multiplayer though, but I did enjoy the ending for single player. I'd recommend it, but I doubt I'll play it again.

7/10

Seek revenge for the lack of cake in the first game.

[h1]Pros[/h1]
[list][*]Will raise your IQ.
[*]Makes you want to hug the things that want to kill you.
[*]Has a talking potato.
[*]Has blimps.
[*]Has eagles.
[*]Builds friendships.
[*]Has funny round things.
[*]Has lovely square things.
[*]Will make you smarter.
[*]Is fun.
[*]Will teach you about your insignifigance.
[/list]
[h1]Cons[/h1]
[list][*]Forces you to learn things.
[*]You are the only being in existence with more than one eye.
[*]The potato sasses you.
[*]Does not contain enough cake.
[*]Destroys friendships.
[/list]

Overall, Portal 2 is like science. You hate it at first. Then a sociopathic robot tries to kill you.
Un juego muy genial por la historia, graficos y todo.! :3 lo adoro y espero el 3 con ganas!

Portal 2 is a great puzzle game which gets harder and harder as the game goes. If you love puzzle games, this is the game for you. There are some problems, one of them is in the singleplayer, where I feel it gets hard fast. And you can get stuck on some missions, you can sit there and work it out for a long time, or cheat and look up that chamber. The test chamber creation is brilliant, and is great if you finish the campaign, so you still play the game. The story has some funny moments, which leads me on to the Co-op. Co-op is longer then singleplayer and has more funny moments, when GLaDOS was saying "Blah blah blah blah" When the computer was speaking a load of rubbish. I have heard people say that the Co-op against someone he is very good at the game is boring, so you will need a friend, but there is still the button to find a random person to play with
This game is really good- Better,advanced and complicated levels, that means that these levels are better than the portal 1 levels. This makes my brain explode if I play this for ages (Love It!)
